editionStmt.edition: Digital Edition in Wylie with TEI Markup

licence.p: The Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0) licence applies to this document.

projectDesc.p: This document was created and is made available in the framework of the ERC project â€œThe Dawn of Tibetan Buddhist Scholasticism (11th-13th c.) (TibSchol). This project has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement No. 101001002). See https://cordis.europa.eu/project/id/101001002

prefixDef.p: In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "db" prefix point to the project's APIS instance, a database system to collect information of entities.
In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "per" prefix point to the BDRC's data interface's person module.
In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "zot" prefix point to a record in the projects's Zotero group.
In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "corpusmd" prefix point to any element in the corpus TEI document via its ID.

body.ab:
buM pa na re de ltar seng bzang?
khyos rgyas 'bring gsum po kun kyi rgyan du 'gyur ba'o 'grel pa gcig rtsom zer na de mkhyed kyis ji ltar du shes zhe na de ni mkhas pa zha'i? gdam ngag la ten nas shes zhes 'brel de lta du byed la |
rngog ni seng? bzang khyod kyis kun kyi rgyan du 'gyur ba'i 'grel pa gcig rtsom zhes daM ta bcas nas 'grel pa rtsom pa des rtsa ba mngon rtogs gyi don mngon suM du gyur ba'i sgo nas rtsom mam ||
'bre na re khongs su rtogs zhes zer ba 'di ltar byas na nyan thos 'phags pas tshig yin pa srid dam zer ba la |
ar na de ngo bo nyid med pa ltogs pa'i blongs dbu mang gnas pa'i blo yin pa srid daM zer ro ||

'byung she na re 'di khyes brgyud ma yin te *gap* bo de la rgyal med pa yin pas byes bskus mi srid de zer ro slob dpon na re phyogs 1 nas de ltar yin pa srid kyang rtso ba'i rgyu'i skabs 'dir 'grel pa rtsoms pa'i rgyu cig don gyi rdogs ma lus pa yod zhes zhal kyis bzhes
pas na kyes rgyung du spog pa ti ka thaMd las byas byes ba rgyu du byaso gsung ngo ||
ku la rtana re don yin te mchod pa brjod ces bshad par dam bca' ba zhes pa ni shes rab zhes pa lasogs pa'o ||
slob dpon sa dang kyi ston gnyis ni nyan thos lhag ched du 'jug shes pa de gcad pa bya ba'i nyer sred pa? kyi shes pa tsam yin pa'i phyir zhes sred bcas dgos po gzungs la |
khu na re mchod par brjod pa'i shugs la bshad par daM ba bstan pa dang |
zhang pad na re mkhyen gsuM tha dad laM yang tha dad du thal |

sregs na re brgyad pa rang nas rtse mo khyad par can yin te dgu rnam kun khyad par can min paso zer ba la slob dpon na re brgyad pa de dus thung ngu zhig ni ma yin pas de legs cha 'bres ldog pa mying bzung na brgyad pa'i rnam kun rgyu yin la rgul yan chad kyi rtse mo 'brus yin la blo rtse nyad pa'i nang la |

khu ston brtson 'grus na re ner ma nor mtshon pa yin zer pa rnog legs pa'i shes rab na re sbyor lam yod pa'i chos dang mtshon pa yon no zer te des? nus pa
las gro bas phras? gsung ngo || sna chung ston pa na re 'gros mtshon pa yin te rab ka mtho lta bu yin lo de'i go ba ni 'bras bus sher phyin gyi rtogs pa de sbyor bas skyed pa yin pas de la slo rtse yin gsung ngo ||

slob dpon zhang ni lo tsa bas rtags gyi mtshid gyi phyogs nas byas pa yin la 'bres rtags kyi ngo bo'i phyogs nas byas pa
yin te lo tsha ba ltar legs la |
rgya dmar na re 'bras'i de thos pas mngon sum gyi rigs yin na rigs zhes ba spyi yin pas na spyi gsal ba'i mthar ma thug pa mi srid pas rnal 'byor gyi mngon sum du 'gyur la |
jo bo mad na re seng bzang gi lcoms te bshad pa ni chos mchog man cad du mkhyen pa gsuM ci rigs par bsgoms nas |

nam ka na b+hu tasi mkhyen pa gsum gyi ye shes dang rnal 'byor pa rang gi shes pa gnyis tha mi dad pa rloms nas sgoM pa yin pas de'i bsaM pa dang sbyor nas nges 'byed la zag med chu rung bshad pa yin lo ||
